version_description:
What’s newly updated

- Cope with iphone 5 screen
- Improved tutorial
- System Optimization

★Enjoy fun and exciting games of Com2uS★

≪Tiny Farm≫ Small and adorable farm within my palm~
≪Homerun Battle 2≫ Real time baseball HOMERUN Action!
≪Swing Shot≫ Throw, hit and dr op them! The greatest casual network battle game!
≪Derby Days≫ Be The Horse Master!
≪9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball≫ REAL BASEBALL! Enjoy reality on the App Store!

Other fun and exciting games are available, too!

What’s newly updated

What’s newly updated

- Expanded HP, MP bar
HP and MP bar is expanded and now easier to see.
- Changed cash item image
Images of certain cash items have changed.
- Fixed other minor bugs
Data error and multi touch error is fixed.

★Enjoy fun and exciting games of Com2uS★

-Homerun Battle 2- Real time baseball HOMERUN Action!
-Tiny Farm- Small and adorable farm within my palm~
-Derby Days- Be The Horse Master!
